channel.title: CVE Feed for Elastic -- Elastic X-Pack Alerting
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elastic -- Elastic X-Pack Alerting

item.title: CVE-2017-8448|2024-08-05T16:34:22.975Z -- elastic -- elastic%20x-pack%20alerting
item.description: An error was found in the permission model used by X-Pack Alerting 5.0.0 to 5.6.0 whereby users mapped to certain built-in roles could create a watch that results in that user gaining elevated privileges.
